data.description: Accelerated introduction to Spanish language practice through writing, reading, speaking and listening. Course equivalent toSPANISH 101and102.
data.title: FIRST YEAR INTENSIVE SPANISH

data.description: All basic language skills: listening comprehension, speaking, reading, and writing. Requires no previous knowledge of Spanish.
data.title: FIRST SEMESTER SPANISH

data.description: Continuation ofSPANISH 101. All basic language skills: listening comprehension, speaking, reading, and writing.
data.title: SECOND SEMESTER SPANISH

data.description: Intermediate-level language review, Hispanic readings, culture, and patterns of conversation.
data.title: THIRD SEMESTER SPANISH
